about_the_game:
Wire up your base designs with all the electronics working just like in Rust. Also allows for placing industrial pipes and water hoses.

Working elevators, door controllers, batteries charge or discharge, lasers/HBHFs/pads can be triggered and RF devices communicate.

Wired ceiling lights will illuminate your base with the new day-night system, all light deployables have a light source now.

Learn about the electrical system with the convenience of Fortify.

Wiring with the upgrade includes some helpful features:
- color wires to help make sense of a complicated circuit
- see power amount over each wire
- disconnect wire ends without having to delete the wire and start over
- while placing wires, press backspace to remove the last bend
- includes extra help like seeing how much power a branch circuit will need
- simulated auto turret interference to match Rust

Wires, pipes and hoses are included when importing/exporting the file format used with the Rust copy-paste plugin.

Includes a new scientist character option for 3rd person and multiplayer which the electric system also works in.

This upgrade will get more new features over time (not just for electricity).

Rust electricity changes will be included as quickly as possible.

Your purchase will also help support further regular Fortity development/updates.

Non-upgraded friends can open electrical saves but are limited to toggling switches and timers.

short_description: Wire electrical devices and make circuits to include with your base designs. Featuring all the electric system devices and functionality found in Rust. Also allows for placing industrial pipes and water hoses. Includes a day-night system with most light deployables having a light source.
